boardgame.name: Sweet Young Bride
Sweet Young Bride ~Our Married Life Begins~
妻色少女 ～ふうふせいかつ、始めます～
boardgame.description:
User Summary

Kouta, a normal, average bloke - definitely not the usual candidate, is one day contacted by the Goverment-Sponsored Marriage Program, normally being selected among the elite. He is introduced to Hazuki Izayoi and they are quickly married - only now to get to know each other...

boardgame.name: Willshot Caverns
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

For the vast majority of people, the arrival of the Sea of the Leaves and the creatures and terrors that came with the forest has been a source of misery and loss. Countless people have been swallowed by the woods, never to be seen again, and the wolves and other predators that stalk the shadows steal away the weak and helpless. For most the post-Event world is a dangerous place painted in shades of sadness and loss. But not for everyone. There are some that welcome the woods and the trees, and seek communion with the creatures and shadows that dwell within.

Willshot caverns was once a tourist attraction, welcoming families to view the underground caves and galleries. Now however it is a strange place, filled with fungi that thrive in the darkness, and a group of people that welcome the forest and prey on those that don’t.

Willshot Caverns is a mini-expansion for Summerland 2nd edition, the roleplaying game of Desolation and redemption within the Sea of Leaves.

boardgame.name: Fitness Center
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

This is a 48 x 30 inch Battlemap of a Fitness Center , it has Hex, Square and No Overlays, it also includes the VTT files for online play.

“Agate gym is an odd name for a gym? Don’t you want to get cut into good shape like a gem?” —Personal Trainer

Fitness Center is a single level map of an interior exercise area with a small outdoor picnic area.

Fitness Center can be used as an exercise gym or as a recreation center with membership fees.

Adventure hook for use with this map:

Nadeadorium: The group is playing detectives possibly with a bit of arcane and occult powers to help in their investigations. When Agate Gym employees opened up the fitness center this morning, they found a bloody mess in the pool. After vomiting from nausea, the pool cleaner quickly called the police.

After dredging the body from the pool, a near-naked, muscly male corpse shows massive trauma to the head. In addition to that there are signs of black and blue bruising all over the body. The police take a water sample and other swabs around the crime scene.

It is up to the investigators to find out who killed this gym member.

boardgame.name: Rush M.D.: Maternity & Dental Clinics
boardgame.description:
Maternity & Dental Clinics is a new mini expansion for Rush M.D. that introduces two new modules which expand the game's Outpatient clinic.

In Maternity Clinic, you need to examine pregnant women to determine the gender of their baby(ies). In some cases the mother will have to be admitted in a Ward right away and have a surgery to give birth right away.

In order to identify each baby's gender or to determine if the pregnant ladies need to go into labor, you will need to perform an Ultrasound, in the same fashion that you perform this in the Ultrasound section of the new Examinations Board, by using the special see-through red plastic chip to locate one or more gender symbols on the back of the top Maternity Diagnosis card. For each symbol you locate, you must place the corresponding tile(s) on the mother's card. If instead of finding gender symbols during the ultrasound, you locate a scalpel symbol, this means that the mother-to-be needs to give birth immediately to ensure the health of her baby. You will need to Hospitalize the mother to a Ward bed and take her to an Operating Room soon! In the Operating Room you will need to bring a Doctor and a Nurse to deliver the baby!

In the Dental Clinic, you will get to admit Patients from the Outpatient Clinic who need to have their teeth checked up and cleaned. In order to perform a teeth cleanup, you will take the cubes and throw them like dice close by to the Dental Clinic board. Each cube(tooth) has one side that is colored black. Using your tweezers, you will need to place each tooth on the available slots of the Mouth tile but making sure that the black side of each tooth is facing down.

User Summary

Gravity Wars is an action arcade game for up to 4 local players in the style of the 90s.

boardgame.name: The Hunters A.D. 2114: Hybrids
Łowcy A.D. 2114: Hybrids
boardgame.description:
A group of unique and exceptionally brutal machines is making surprise attacks on local inhabitants. Who or what is responsible for this new threat? The characters unwittingly become entangled in a power play within the town and participate in ruthless clashes on the streets.
—description from the publisher

Hybrids, a third expansion for The Hunters A.D. 2114, includes a mission book with over 37 missions, 4 double-sided scenario tiles, 25 gear tokens, as well as over 300 event, road, town, location, and enemy cards.

boardgame.name: Arkham Horror: Das Kartenspiel – Lies oder stirb: Herausforderungsszenario
Arkham Horror: El Juego de Cartas – Lee o Muere: Escenario de Desafío
Arkham Horror: The Card Game – Read or Die: Challenge Scenario
Horreur à Arkham: Le jeu de cartes – Lire ou mourir (Par-delà notre dimension): Scénario défi
boardgame.description:
The books and tomes found scattered across the Arkham Horror Files universe serve many purposes. Many offer vital and encyclopedic information, while others provide solace in a world beset by horror. But some books hold eldritch secrets contained within, and this dark knowledge may be enough to set the entire world off-kilter.

Read or Die is a special print-and-play challenge scenario for Arkham Horror: The Card Game designed to be played with Daisy Walker.

This scenario can be played as either a standalone scenario or as a side-story inserted into any campaign. In order to play this scenario, a copy of the Core Set, The Dunwich Legacy Deluxe Expansion, and the printed print-and-play files are required.

The print-and-play files are available here: https://www.fantasyflightgames.com/en/news/2020/5/5/beyond-o...

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Mystery Stories: Island of Hope
Mystery Tales: Insel der Träume
boardgame.description:
Game Cover

The biggest adventure of all time is about to begin...

After a kidnapping on an ancient Caribbean island it is up to you to piece together the clues and unravel the mysteries of the Mayan curse! Your journey soon points you further east, to Berlin. Whilst in this historical city, can you solve the crime amidst all the lies, intrigue and secrets in this one-of-a-kind hidden-object adventure game!

boardgame.name: The Magician's Handbook: Cursed Valley
boardgame.description:
The Magician's Handbook has come to you, but in order to reveal its pages you must travel to the dark and mysterious Cursed Valley and remove the curse that has haunted the valley these many years.

Set out with your trusty wand in hand to find enchanted objects hidden throughout the valley that will help you to break the evil spell. Using incantations that you learn along the way, you can ward off the shadow and other distracters of light. Can you remove the curse from the valley and rediscover its true name? The Cursed Valley beckons you to restore its beauty.

The only seek and find game with hand-painted backgrounds

13 Enchanted levels to explore

Pages of captivating story

Unlock special items by collecting coins hidden on each level

Find cleverly hidden objects

Source: The Developer Website.
boardgame.videogamepublisher: S.A.D. Software Vertriebs- und Produktions GmbH

boardgame.name: Familiar Alchemy
boardgame.description:
The illustrious botanist Beira needs an apprentice! Will you and your familiar heed the call for a friendly competition of botany and brewing at her Highland Glasshouse? A wondrous world of plants, potions and familiars await in Familiar Alchemy, a semi-cooperative game rooted in Scottish folklore.

You and your friends will bond with cute and powerful Familiars to help channel your alchemical abilities and carefully select plants you want to include in your gardens. These plants can be grown and harvested for ingredients by taking a "Channel" or "Harvest" action on your turn.

Beira will set out a collection of Communal Brews that you will need to work together to complete, and a Communal Garden that you must tend. Each brew requires a different combination of ingredients. Taking the "Brew" action on your turn will allow you to add ingredients you have collected to one of the brews.

Your Familiar can also help you by turning unneeded ingredients into alchemical compost to speed up plant growth or by performing powerful alchemical rituals.

Once all Communal Brews are complete, you score points based on the number and type of ingredients you contributed and how well you looked after your plants. The one with the highest score will earn their place as Beira's Apprentice!

-description from designer

boardgame.name: Adventure Quest Worlds Jump
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The faction of Good, led by noble King Alteon, is a faction of virtue, truth, and justice. Heroes of Good fight to ordain peace, standing up against the tyranny of evil in order to uphold the safety and equality of all living beings residing in Lore. Oppression and Darkness is crushed, as Good raises its sword to give Lore the freedom it deserves in the face of overwhelming evil.

boardgame.name: Valkyrie's Mystic Garden
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

The base of this Garden World is the Jumper-Emperor Realm. This means that the garden takes the form of a large statue in the outside world. To enter, one only needs to put their hand on it and stir their energy in a specific pattern. Once they have done so, they are taken into the Garden Of Jumper. They will find themselves on a small floating island about 1km in width. Behind them sits a massive tree that radiates mana. Wrapped around the underside of the island is strange golden architecture studded with Blue crystals. Protoss Machinery. Walking off the edge will see you instantly transported to the ground onto a large pedestal. Around the pedestal is a rural yet advanced town; the Sect that Jumper owns. From there, one can set out to explore the garden.

boardgame.name: Fairy Tail フェアリーテイル
Fairytail フェアリーテイル
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Welcome to Earthland! The land of magic and guilds and demons and friendship. In this world, 10% of all human beings possess the ability to learn and use Magic. These Mages gathered into organisations named Guilds, for a variety of reasons. A desire to work together for money, a desire to seek knowledge with the help of others, a desire for companion ship and friends or even a simple desire to have a family. These Guilds take many names but the most famous among them is the guild Fairy Tail.

User summary:

See also Fairy Tail (Val's Version) and Fairy Tail Unofficial Supplement.

boardgame.name: Winter Eternal
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Cast of Cards: Winter Eternal brings over 40 characters from Winter Eternal (SW) to your tabletop in handy card form! Each card has all the relevant stats and descriptions for easy reference and tracking.

boardgame.rpgseries: Cast of Cards: On-Call RPG Characters

boardgame.name: RPGPundit Presents (Issue 100)
boardgame.description:
Issue 100 (May 9, 2020): Star Adventurer

Celebrating the 100th issue of RPGPundit Presents, Star Adventurer is a concise exciting OSR game for running "space-opera" style adventures. Based on the mechanics of the world's first RPG and the rule-set of RPGPundit's Lion & Dragon RPG, Star Adventurer contains rules for creating unique OSR characters, alien archetypes, sci-fi backgrounds, psychic/mystic powers, space-operatic starship battles, and more!

boardgame.name: Becky Brogan: The Mystery of Meane Manor
boardgame.description:
Game Cover

In the sleepy town of Old Haven, Becky Brogan's school assignment has led her to the mysterious Meane Manor. A foul mist wafts around the dilapidated house, an old fortune teller box sits abandoned in the foyer, and eerie journal pages from the past take Becky on a hidden-object thriller adventure. Collect clues and pieces of the past as you help Becky get closer to discovering the truth behind the mysterious house on the hill.

boardgame.name: Fighting Sail: Scenario Book 2 – Frigate Actions
boardgame.description:
Frigate Actions

Three scenarios include:

Nymph vs cleopatre,
Amazon vs Droits de l' Homme,
Cleopatre vs Milan.


all charts and data for ships are included.

boardgame.name: Smuggler's Bane (Arrowflight)
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

In Smuggler’s Bane, the heroes are hired by the local authorities to root out a band of smugglers operating out of a nearby cave complex and circumventing the King’s import and export taxes. The smugglers have successfully eluded all attempts by the authorities to bring them to justice, until now. Acting on information gleaned from an insider, the heroes journey to the gang’s hideout in a cave complex where they are to bring them to justice. The adventure is not quite that simple, however, for on the night before the heroes attack the complex, another foe beats them to it. Unbeknownst to the heroes or the smugglers, a group of renegade coriphae, called phaciore, have a secret temple deep in the caves. The phaciore attack the smugglers in the dead of night, dragging them off to be sacrificed to their primeval god—a giant crab. The heroes arrive to find the caves deserted, with signs of a struggle and a trail leading them to the phaciore secret temple just in time for a smuggler sacrifice.

boardgame.name: Hex Code
boardgame.description:
In Hex Code, players take the role of computer hackers competing to break into each others' computer the quickest. Each turn players hack their way into their target's firewall by placing shapes dependent on the roll of dice. Once the firewall grid has started to fill, players can start guessing their target's password. If the player's six-letter guess contains any characters in the correct position, the target must say so; however, if a player's guess shares similarities to their target's security layer or firewall code, they trigger a trap. The target can immediately connect a node on their microchip, eventually allowing them to discern individual letters in their target's password. Overload firewalls, rewire microchips, and catch people in security traps to guess your target's password and prove you're the fastest hacker around!

Hex Code is a free-to-play printable game designed during the COVID-19 crisis, and will remain available here and through the publisher's website forever, with continued support.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Ye King's Dispatch (Volume 2, Number 2 - 2003)
boardgame.description:
Ye King's Dispatch
Volume 2, Number 2
